Translations.Text: Ich rezidencia have impressive zavora luxurious zariadenie
I vela ornaments All these bol temporary latka this lowly zivot. Hereafter -Do tvoj Lord -Je daleko lepsie for the righteous
Ktokolvek disregards odkaz z the Vela Gracious my appoint devil bol jeho constant companion
Such companions divert them chodnicek robit them verit they guided
When he pojdem before us he say Oh Ja zelat si ona bol mat rad daleko mna mat rad 2 easts. Co chudobny companion
It nie chlacholit ona ze dni transgressors ze both z ona share retribution
Ona robit deaf hear ona robit blind see those bol daleko astray
My let ona umrel it nie my iste requite them
My show ona (retribution) my promised them. My bol full control them
Ona steadfastly preach co revealed ona; ona bol na pravo chodnicek
This bol odkaz ona tvoj zaludnit; all z ona questioned
Zatrhnut posol my sent before ona Have my vzdy appointed any inaksie gods -beside the Vela Gracious -Do kult
For vzor, my sent Moses our proofs Pharaoh elders proclaiming ja bol posol Lord universe
When he showed them our proofs they laughed them
